General.Name: Ictsi Jasa Prima Tbk
General.Description: PT ICTSI Jasa Prima Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development, construction, and operation of maritime infrastructure facilities and related services in Indonesia. The company offers services on maintenance, operation, and utilization of maritime facilities and infrastructure, including concession of berths, terminal services, which include loading and unloading services; and maintenance and repair, and operation of technical, mechanical, and electronic equipment/aids, as well as machinery and special scales. It also provides computer software and hardware related to facilities and infrastructure of maritime logistics; and stevedoring, cargodoring, and cargo inspection area services. In addition, the company is involved in the rental of heavy equipment; and offers other civil building construction, port building construction, dredging, transportation consulting, as well as warehousing and transportation support services. Further, it engages in the development, trading, industrial, agribusiness, repair shop, land transportation, and other activities. The company was formerly known as PT Maharlika Indonesia Tbk and changed its name to PT ICTSI Jasa Prima Tbk in August 2012. The company was incorporated in 1978 and is based in Jakarta Utara, Indonesia. PT ICTSI Jasa Prima Tbk is a subsidiary of ICTSI Far East Pte. Ltd.
General.Address: Graha Kirana Building, Jakarta Utara, Indonesia, 14350
